= Linux =

== TTY ==

On Fedora:

* Enter TTY:
  - `Ctrl+Alt+F3` (onwards) - open new TTY sessions
  - `Ctrl+Alt+F2` - first session, usually the GUI
  - `Ctrl+Alt+F1` - the login screen

* Change TTY font:
  - `setfont /lib/kbd/consolefonts/iso07u-16.psfu.gz`

= Software design =
